bill_title: revise the formula for using certain real property sales to assess other real property.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the formula for using certain real property sales to assess other real property. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-6-74 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-74. Any If any real property which sells for more than one hundred fifty percent of its assessed value, may not the sale may only be used for the purpose of valuing other real property . The sale of any real property which is not used for the purpose of valuing other real property pursuant to this section may not be used in any sales ratio study by adjusting the sale price to one hundred fifty percent of its assessed value or eighty percent of its sale price, whichever amount is greater . 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
